medical_history.chief_complaint: I am very nervous, stressed out, and I cry a lot.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began during childhood with a history of generalized anxiety. This is apparently her first episode of major depression, characterized by poor sleep, frequent awakenings, diminished appetite, excessive worrying, headaches, muscle aches, feelings of worthlessness, psychomotor agitation, and restlessness. Symptoms escalated over the first few weeks but improved after treatment, achieving remission at the end of the 10th week.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of generalized anxiety since childhood; no prior episodes of major depression or substance abuse.
medical_history.social_history: Denies any history of alcohol or drug abuse. Occasional use of nicotine increases her nervousness.
